subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Bradley, the former U.S. team coach, took on the task of restoring Egypt as a soccer power in Africa and as a World Cup finals participant for the third time in its history.
snippet: Bradley, the former U.S. team coach, took on the task of restoring Egypt as a soccer power in Africa and as a World Cup finals participant for the third time in its history.
